page.title: 06My Pigeons and I.
page.content: I love my pigeon he is blotched with red green and black. He has won two races for me,{the Dorchester}and the {Short Race.} I sent him across the water and he came in third,and I won a badge with a pigeon on it. Our pigeon's cote is called{Smithurst {and Son.} I found my pigeon in a crows nest,so I took him home. I found him two years ago when I was eight years old. I like my pigeons very much. His mate{Eagle}has had two baby chicks. Their names are{Bit}and {Black.} I also have a pigeon called Three Seasons because he got lost and was away for three flying seasons,and when he came back we named him{Three {Seasons.
